professional_summary: Skilled Oracle DBA with expertise in database administration, migration, disaster recovery, and data guard configuration. Proficient in various tools and databases, aiming to leverage technical skills for effective IT solutions.

key_responsibilities: Performed troubleshooting and resolved issues impacting database performance and availability.
Migrated and upgraded databases from legacy systems to current versions with minimal downtime.
Implemented disaster recovery solutions using RMAN and Data Guard for physical and logical standby databases.
Configured Oracle Streams and Materialized Views for data replication.
